blog.name: chimchimsauce
blog.title: 나의 천사 나의 세상
blog.description: ✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ:* PARK JIMIN is my baby man ✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ:* Directory

title: Sanctuary (13)
body:
YN is a young girl, bright and ambitious, but due to her busy schedule, she’s been unable to make any real friends. When an ad for Saint Mary’s Sanctuary catches her attention, she never expected her life to be changed by a certain hybrid named Jimin.

Tag List:  @feed-my-geek-soul @raspberryhaterade @dinorahrodriguez @loriosborne @majestikblue @younginfluencernut-blog @jiminotopia @yady24 @amoretti-rossetti  @j-hofe7 @scared-money @alina-foxy @catwhipes @cloudyfelix @justfollowbacon @chims-kookies @hoodiebangtan @xanny91 @catarina-catycaty @lewd-lemon @yaseminflames @lulanii @jeonsdear @omgsasusakulover @let-fred-live @perfectlyfangirling @daddyjoonie @meganleafmusic  @okayjinmin @blueskys-brightstars @boononx  @bubblefishrainbow @scamanderbeasts @cjisluckycharm @artsy-gingersnap  @yoongi-bias @miraiikki @ccocorosie @pauline-pao @skyebloodhood @mochi-you-are-beautiful @mixedfandxms @vixsynsblog @mypurplelamp @acupoftaewithsuga @xthefuckerysquaredx @take-u-2-an0ther-w0r1d @young-yellkie @yoonjinbabe @animedreamscometrue @thefutureiswithyou  @2seokkyo @x-josii-x  @childish—soul @accfrtmblr @lilliaflurr @daddyvernon   @blondkris @byentutin @jiminslye @moostachoaway @veryuniqueusernamegoeshere @beatstotheheart @im-a-percy @upbangtansonyeondan @stargazingmoonchild @dreadity @lovesickpjms

Comment if you want to be added to the tag list!

Chapter Twelve 

Chapter Thirteen

YN wasn’t quite sure what to expect as she enters her keys into the doorknob.

Would Jimin be angry with her? Would he go into another possessive fit? Would he refuse to speak with her? Maybe even decide he wants to leave? 

All dark thoughts are chased away when the door opens to reveal a very apologetic Jimin sitting on the floor, a handful of freshly pulled wildflowers squished tightly in his grasp. 

He almost flinches when he catches her eye before looking away, shakily extending the peace offering her way. 

“I’m sorry,” He says quietly. “I - what?” YN asks, taking the weeds.“I shouldn’t have done that. I just got so caught up and I was upset but I don’t really know why and -”

“It’s okay, Jiminie,” She says, pulling the wolf into a hug, “Someone was going to see you sooner or later anyway and the story you came up with is probably the most realistic one. We don’t look anything alike and you mentioning that you are sharing my bed threw the whole roommates thing out the window,”

She pulls away to see him looking incredibly relieved.

“So you’re not angry with me?”

“No, not really. I know you’re probably going crazy having to stay here all day. And don’t worry, after I get my paycheck this week, I’ll be able to buy you a bed for the other room so you can finally have your own space. I bet you’re happy to hear that,”

Jimin, in fact, was not happy to hear that at all. He’s gotten used to falling asleep wrapped in the warmth of another person and surrounded by YN’s calming scent. 

Even though the girl mentioned getting him his own space from the start, he never put much merit in it, figuring that it would be a long time before it happened. But now …

“Actually, why don’t you just save the money? I don’t have to get my own space. I don’t mind staying with you,” He says softly as YN takes off her coat and puts it away.

“That’s very sweet of you. Jimin, but it’s alright. I’m already picking up extra hours. I want to give you everything I can. Your own space is a good place to start,”

“But,” Jimin says, following YN to sit down on the couch.

The wolf lays his head on her lap, sighing when her fingers start to run through his hair, messaging his scalp.

“I want to stay with you. I don’t want my own space,” He says, fighting back the embarrassment that threatens to choke out his words, “I feel lonely when you’re not around,”

“Really?”

He nods, holding her tighter.

“I wish I could be around you all the time. You’re my person,0

”YN can’t help but feel soft.

“You’re my person too, Jiminie,”

The two eat dinner together before washing up and snuggling in bed, watching old reruns. YN drifts off a bit before eleven, Jimin watching her take slow, even breaths.

She has his heart. She’s had it for a long time. Jimin is to this day still unconvinced that this is actually his new reality. YN is so hardworking and kind. She wears her heart on her sleeve no matter how many times people take advantage of it. Every day she comes home exhausted but still grinning, spirit bright. It’s what he loves most about her.

He freezes, heartbeat thundering in his ears.

It’s what he loves most about her. But he loves everything about her.“I,” Jimin whispers out lowly next to her sleeping figure, TV buzzing lightly in the background, “I think I love you,”

Jimin feels as if his heart is going to fall out of his chest.

“No. I know I love you,” He confesses. “I’m in love with you, YN,” he says, flopping down against the mattress and staring at the ceiling.

He suddenly doesn’t know what to call all the emotions floating around inside of him. He’s in love with her, he’s sure.

Will they end up being like those couples he sees on television? Will he get to hold her hand, go out to dinners and have adventures on warm summer days? Will they be together forever? Maybe even get married? Have kids?

He looks over at her and sees a future, a fairytale.

Rolling closer, he burrows under the bedsheets, spooning the girl.

She’s always been the one to look out for him. Now he’s got to be the one to look out for her. His YN.

The next morning, once YN leaves for work, Jimin puts his plan in action. He hardly slept at all, mind alive with thoughts and fantasies.

But before any of them can come true, before he can confess to her, he’s got to get work done.

Jimin hasn’t been to school in over ten years and his new identity has him as a high school dropout. A quick call to Taehyung and he’s enrolled in an online GED prep program, his test scheduled for two months from today.

Jimin made Taehyung promise not to tell YN, as he wanted to surprise her with his diploma. It’s the first step of many, but if he wants them to be together he’s got to be able to help provide for the two of them. He wants her to be proud of him.

Jimin nearly preens at the thought. 

Chapter Fourteen

blog.name: ao3feednamjin
blog.title: *winkwonk*
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: The Journey to Forever
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2zwWvsu

by sevenpabosandafan

A collection of Namjin date’s from The Meaning of Family universe

*their first date, if requested, will be included in my work First Dates

Words: 1196, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 31 of The Meaning of Family

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Kim Namjoon | RM, Kim Seokjin | Jin, Min Yoongi | Suga, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope, Park Jimin (BTS), Kim Taehyung | V, Jeon Jungkook, Kim Seokjin | Jin’s Mother
  • Relationships: Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin

blog.name: btsengland
blog.title:
BTS Reactions Account
Request Open :)
blog.description:
I don’t own any images or gifs!

Send me any Requests 💕

I Purple You Army 💜

body:
BTS Reaction-Dating Taehyung 💕

Being the thing he clings to and cuddles with to help him fall asleep

Listening to his worries and helping him through them, giving him advice and showering him with praise and love

Looking after Yeontan together and videoing his journey through life

Him making sure your eating and taking care of you when you go out together

He likes to take photos and videos of you when you go out because he things everything you do is cute and he can look back on the memories when he misses you

Styling him in Gucci clothes because you know how much he loves wearing Gucci

The way he looks at you

He always acts cute around you because he knows how much you love it and how much it makes you smile

summary: hey! my name is sophie! i was wondering wondering if i could have a ship for both? if not, just seventeen is fine! my friends...
caption:
hey! my name is sophie! i was wondering wondering if i could have a ship for both? if not, just seventeen is fine! my friends would describe me as cute, hilarious, soft, caring and sweet. i enjoy acting, singing and dancing. i also really like photography and aesthetics. i am from australia which is pretty cool, i guess. thank you so much! 💗
